pluginstrument.author: Russ Barlow
pluginstrument.description:
See generic RMI. Gauge works when there is power on the main bus that means either engine 1 or 2 is firing.
V 1.11 - replaced jpg by png
V1.1 - The bezel can now be hidden by clicking in the top left corner of the instrument - New graphics to match all of my ATR gauges
